subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /LC's Radio Shack Hack Recordings/spirit_rescue_very_important_11708.wav 
  Uploaded by : lcdupla <lcdupla@...> 
  Description : 11708 RS12470: Spirit rescue question and response... "We missed you. Please Chuck...very important. Very important. Yes."  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/LC%27s%20Radio%20Shack%20Hack%20Recordings/spirit_rescue_very_important_11708.wav
